Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Report

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Report
public class Report extends Object
The report class represent the situation present of an island and permit the computation of the influence, to represent the situation of the island the report have the attributes to represent the owner of an island, the number of tower, the students for each color, and the extra point for a ColorTower due to the activation of a character card

  • Constructor Details

    • Report

      public Report(ColorTower owner, int towerNumbers, Map<Color,Integer> students, ColorTower extraPointReceiver, int extrapoints)
      Constructor of the entity Report, Report is the entity used to calculate the influence of a island, is created by the method getreport in island
      Parameters:
      owner - is the owner of the island, is null if the island don't havve a owner
      towerNumbers - is the number of towers in the island
      students - a map of the students in the island
      extraPointReceiver - The colorTower (that represent the user) that will receive extrapoint (if a specific character card is active)
      extrapoints - the number of point the user receive (if active a specific character card)
